name: SELECT
INSERT
examples:
INSERT INTO table_name (column1, column2) VALUES ('value1', 'value2');
INSERT INTO table_name (column1, column2) VALUES ('value1', 'value2'), ('value3', 'value4');

name: UPDATE
examples: UPDATE table_name SET column1 = 'new_value' WHERE column2 = 'value';

name: CREATE TABLE
examples: CREATE TABLE table_name (column1 TEXT, column2 INTEGER, column3 REAL);

name: ALTER TABLE
examples:
ALTER TABLE table_name ADD COLUMN new_column TEXT;
ALTER TABLE table_name RENAME TO new_table_name;

name: JOIN
GROUP BY & ORDER BY
